short_summary: Project Leadership for Real Property Divestiture
description: One Senior Project Leader for Real Property required to assist with real property portfolio divestiture activities and overall management of the ISC and CIRNAC Real Property Portfolio.
full_summary:
# Senior Project Leader for Real Property

## Tender Details

* Tender Reference: CB-8678-4151453
* Solicitation Number: 1000252593
* Amendment Number: 5
* Tender Status: Expired
* Tender Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Overview

The Department of Indigenous Services Canada is seeking to engage the services of a Senior Project Leader for Real Property to manage the real property portfolio divestiture activities and the overall management of the ISC and CIRNAC Real Property Portfolio. The proposed contract will be awarded for an initial period of one (1) year, with two (2) option years.

## Key Details

* Contract period: 2023-10-02 to 2025-09-30
* Expected contract value: Not specified
* Level of effort: 150 days per year (600 days if option periods are exercised)
* Possible extensions: Two one-year extensions, subject to mutual agreement between the parties.

## Location

The work will be located in the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Criteria for Selection

The contract will be awarded based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Terms and Conditions

The contract will be governed by the standard terms and conditions of the Crown, as set out in the Canada Tendering Act and the Public Works and Government Services Act.

## Contact Information

For any queries or requests for information, please contact:
Alma Moyeda
Indigenous Services Canada
Gatineau, QC, K1A 0H4 (819) 271-6488
alma.moyeda@sac-isc.gc.ca

Note: This document has been reformatted to improve readability while maintaining the necessary information about the tender announcement. All essential details have been preserved and professionally rephrased for clarity.
